modName: The Legend of Zelda - Biggoron Sword
summary: This adds the Biggoron Sword to the game.
descriptionHtml:
I made this sword because i found LeckerHamster\'s tutorial and then I thought to myself \'Ah, what the heck. I\'ll share it to get some criticism.\'

So here it is. Behold my first creation ever, the Biggoron Sword from The Legend of Zelda - Ocarina of Time (and that one other game, but I didn\'t play that so whatever).
Of course the textures are not the originals from the game.

To get it, do the help biggoron 4 thing and then player.additem it or craft it under steel category.

Feel free to criticize as much as you want, as long as it\'s constructive I\'ll appreciate it.

Also it\'s my first time, so be gentle ;)

Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8hYHj2Dy49s&feature=related
and his Mods: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/631265-wip-my-projects/
author: superhorst
